timeline.title: Company Founded
timeline.description: AgroInternational Pty Ltd established with a vision to connect premium agro-products with global markets.

timeline.title: Product Line Expansion
timeline.description: Expanded portfolio to include coffee, tea, macadamia, and premium spices from sustainable sources.

timeline.title: International Partnerships
timeline.description: Established partnerships with distributors across Asia, Europe, and the Middle East.

timeline.title: Sustainability Certification
timeline.description: Achieved Organic and Fairtrade certifications, reinforcing our commitment to ethical sourcing.

timeline.title: Global Growth
timeline.description: Serving 15+ countries worldwide with a network of 100+ partner farms and growing.
